level.heading: Authorization to test materials in laboratory of Department of Transportation.
Legislative History of Law 6-85
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-85, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 2-225.01.

level.heading: Transfer of Functions
level.text: The functions of the Department of Transportation were transferred to the Department of Public Works by Reorganization Plan No. 4 of 1983, effective March 1, 1984.
